data.title: Opens early
data.text: This location is great because it's the only one nearby that opens at 4am and they always get my drink right. Can be hard to get to at times but their service is fast and make sip for lost time

data.title: Driving instructions that may help you miss the confusing entrance.
data.text: Traffic can be challenging. If you are driving on Hwy 3, turn into the parking lot where the drive thru exits.  This will avoid a mess created at eastbound FM518.  If you are driving East on FM518, turn North (left) at the Hwy 3 light, the immediately turn right into the exit which will give you the option to park or enter the drive thru with ease.  If you stay on FM518 thru the light, you get entangled trying to turn left into the drive-in lane.

data.title: Giving up on this location
data.text: As a Starbucks customer on a daily basis (either myself, my husband or our teenager) this location has the weakest baristas of anywhere I have ever been. Not every single time- but enough times over the past year for it to be memorable -- the orders are bungled but more often, they never taste the way other buckys do. Almost always a case of too much milk. Beverages come out practically white in color & cold, lattes and braves have virtually no cap of foam and are almost entirely milk. My daughter will decline ordering from this location as her drinks are always off. Yesterday I got the flat white which for me, is a welcome balance to too much milk in coffee, in general. Two other locations (pearland & beltway 8 and the nasa rd 1) get it right every every time. This place sent it out *twice* as a milky latte. The top was completely white, wrong milk texture. And then try to 'explain' to me how it's made. Honestly,  i don't think they are getting trained like the other places or the expertise is just not getting passed along to new hires becuz there's always newbies there. They are friendly however, they try but something is off-- sorry but  I give up on this location!

data.title: One of the Best Starbucks!
data.text: A Starbucks is usually a Starbucks, same everywhere you visit, but this one is large and inviting and the employees are usually very friendly.  It appears to be very clean as well.  Drive-through can be long and it's a narrow driveway, so just park your car, get out and go inside.

data.title: Your typical Starbucks
data.text: Your typical Starbucks - good coffees & teas for a fairly high price.  Drive-thru is nice if they aren't too busy.  Free Wi-Fi is really nice.

data.title: Do I have to spell it for you ?
data.text: I love Sturbucks, I can  not even imagine starting my day  with out my special ( no I am not telling you ) Workers are extreamly friendly  and pastrys are always fresh . Best plae to chill out .

data.title: It's Starbucks!
data.text: Nice clean store, great for a little break or a fast snack.

data.title: A Must
data.text: This is the best Starbucks...a neighborhood fixture..good humored barristas that make it the way it should be made!
